Content.Text: The first time you fall below half health each fight, Slow {ability.e1.targets} items for {ability.e1} second(s).
The first time you fall below half health each fight, Freeze {ability.e1.targets} items for {ability.e1} second(s).
The first time you fall below half health each fight, Haste {ability.e1.targets} items for {ability.e1} second(s).
The first time you fall below half health each fight, Shield {ability.e1}.
The first time you fall below half health each fight, Heal {ability.e1}.
The first time you fall below half health each fight, poison {ability.e1}.
The first time you fall below half health each fight, burn {ability.e1}.
This has double Crit Chance bonus and cooldown reduction.
This has double Crit Chance bonus.

e1.InternalDescription: When this item gains Freeze, remove Freeze from it.

e2.InternalDescription: When this item gains Slow, remove Slow from it.

Content.Text: This cannot be Frozen, Slowed or Destroyed.
Adjacent items have their cooldown reduced by {aura.2}%.

0.InternalDescription: The item to the left of this has +{aura.0}% Crit Chance.

1.InternalDescription: The item to the right of this has its cooldown reduced by +{aura.1}%.
